price: ߌ ߓߘߊ߫ ߛߌ߬ߓߏ ߞߍ߫ ߕߎ߬ߢߊ ߘߌ߫ ߸ ߒ߬ߓߊ߬ ߊ߲ ߧߋ߫ ߢߊ߬ߓߊ߮ ߟߎ߫ ߛߙߊ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߕߋ߲߬ ߠߋ߬
arabic: قَدۡ صَدَّقۡتَ ٱلرُّءۡيَآۚ إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: qad ṣaddaqta al-ru'yā innā kadhālika najzī al-muḥ'sinīna
